dmca.title: Fishy Copying Leads Aquarium Fan to Google DMCA Complaint
dmca.body:
We have had many copy write issues with sites ?borrowing? my articles without the proper linked credit being given. This steals our ?link juice? and is often performed by spammer simply trying to peddle un-related merchandise while using Adsense.

Here is a list of MY URLs and the corresponding offending URLs.

*From my sponge filtration blogs and information articles ( http://spongefilter.blogspot.com/2007/09/inexpensive-pond-filtration.html & http://www.americanaquariumproducts.com/sponge_filtration.html ):

Offender:
http://www.xanga.com/mellisentgumb/618284343/inexpensive-biological-and-mechanical-pond-filtration.html

*From my Aquarium Answers Blog ( http://aquarium-answers.blogspot.com/2006/11/aquarium-hang-on-back-power-filters.html ):

Offender
http://mypets.twentyninthings.com/2007/06/18/aquarium-hang-on-the-back-power-filters-hob-filters-their-strengths-and-weaknesses-especially-in-bio-filtration/

*From My UV Sterilization article and blog ( http://americanaquariumproducts.com/AquariumUVSterilization.html & http://aquariumuvsterilizer.blogspot.com/ ):

Offender:
http://www.equitygroups.com/stocktipsandpicks/id__14698/messages/122803.html

"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."
